name: Ray Donovan Season 2
summary:
Showtime电视台已经续订了新剧《清道夫》( Ray Donovan )的第二季。 

Showtime频道总裁在一份声明中说道：“《清道夫》即将成为Showtime史上最成功的新剧，（本剧的创作人）安·彼得曼( Ann Biderman )率领极具天才的制作团队，与由列维·施瑞博尔( Liev Schreiber )领衔的星光熠熠的演员阵容一起，共同创造出了今年最火爆的新剧。我们非常骄傲而兴奋地宣布将续订新一季。” 

施瑞博尔在剧中扮演一个好莱坞明星的“清道夫”，本剧自上个月开播以来已经破纪录成为Showtime频道迄今为止开局最好的剧集。更令人印象深刻的是，本剧在播出的第二周，收视率继续上涨15%，观看人数达到220万。 

（转自人人影视新闻组）
info:
• 中文名: 清道夫 第二季
  • 配角: Elliott Gould
  • 别名: 雷·多诺万 第二季
  • 集数: 12
  • 开始: 2014-07-13
  • 结束: 2014-09-28
  • 类型: 剧情/罪案
  • 国家/地区: 美国
  • 语言: 英语

eps.name: Yo Soy Capitan
eps.desc: Ray's life returns to normal. The FBI demands that Mickey be brought to them. Abby, concerned for their marriage, forces Ray into therapy with her. Meanwhile, Bunchy attempts to recover from his abuse and applies for a job, Terry obsesses over Frances and Conor is in trouble after assaulting a classmate.

eps.name: Uber Ray
eps.desc: Having difficulty in controlling Mickey upon returning him to LA, Ray bribes corrupt parole officer Ronald Keith to keep an eye on his father; As Ed Cochran holds a press conference declaring the FBI caught Sully, Boston Globe reporter Kate McPherson launches her own investigation on what happened at the docks.

eps.name: Gem and Loan
eps.desc: Desperate to get Bridget into the prestigious Bel-Air Academy, Ray is forced to do an unusual favor for old rival Stu Feldman; Mickey's attempts to see his old lover are thwarted by Keith; Kate arrives at Terry's Fight Club looking for answers; Abby's therapist tries to convince her that Ray is bribing her; an old friend reenters Bridget's life.

eps.name: S.U.C.K.
eps.desc: Ray and the FBI must deal with Tiny, Sully's nephew who spoke to the cops about his involvement in Sully's death; After sleeping with Kate, Ray purchases a new house for Abby, who befriends a police officer at a shooting range; Bunchy makes friends with a woman and her child at his new job; Kate attempts to talk to Mickey

eps.name: Irish Spring
eps.desc: Ray gets compromising information on Cochran. Avi follows Kate as she investigates, but Ray will need to give her a new story. Meanwhile, Abby tries to have fun with her prospective new neighbors, but their comments lead to a violent outburst. Marvin takes Bridget to a party at the house of a hip-hop mogul. Conor apologizes to Alex - but it doesn't go well.

eps.name: Sunny
eps.desc: Ray learns the truth around Abby's absence's, and confronts Jim (the cop) about their affair. Cookie wants Marvin back for himself because he feels that his initial investment entitles him to all the money that the boy will make. Mickey gets the opportunity to sell his life story into a trilogy, but ends up losing it. Bridget is the sole witness to Cookie's brutality, after he murders Marvin and his father.

eps.name: Snowflake
eps.desc: Ray and Abby have different opinions on how to handle Bridget's dangerous situation; Kate turns to a new source for answers; Bunchie has an awkward moment with his girlfriend's son; Mickey and Shorty plan a heist.

eps.name: Volcheck
eps.desc: Kate's return to Los Angeles sets off a violent chain of events involving Ray's past; Cochran is offered directorship of the FBI, but discovers a horrifying video; Mickey and Shorty welcome two new members to their heist crew; Abby gives Jim a startling ultimatum.

eps.name: Rodef
eps.desc: Ray prepare his loved ones for the event of his arrest; Mickey's heist does not go according to plan; Ray obtains the video of Marvin's murder; Jim cannot bring himself to follow through on Abby's plan; Ezra turns to a new ally in dealing with Kate.

eps.name: The Captain
eps.desc: A murder forces Ray into action against several of his enemies; After the stolen safe yields less than expected, Mickey comes up a new source for money; Jim gives Abby an enticing offer; An imprisoned Terry refuses to accept bail; Bunchie reveals his past to Patty
